name: Eli Dasa
description:
Today is a very special day for our website. Today, our website is a man! Cue the music!

Hava nagila
Hava nagila
Hava nagila ve-nismeḥa

That is, if you assume that our website is male. Which we can't really do. So let's just say that today, our website is an adult!

Hava neranenah
Hava neranenah
Hava neranenah ve-nismeḥa

13 years? Can you believe it? And today's profile is someone special — someone who would have been 13 himself when our website opened, all the way back in 2006. His name is Eli Dasa, he plays soccer for the Israeli national team, and, yes, he is a landsman — his parents are Ethiopian Jews!

Uru, uru aḥim!
Uru aḥim be-lev sameaḥ

So, celebrate with us as we profile yet another mold-breaker, a black star athlete Jew! (After 13 years, he is not our first!)

Uru aḥim, uru aḥim!
Be-lev sameaḥ...
